name: Diablo
notes:
Diablo option is working
Diablo Classic option crashes
Menus are not refreshing properly but it is still possible to get into the game and the game works well.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Diablo/dx/DiabloLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
  overrides:
    ddraw.dll: n
